Dear "{!Account.Name}"
Please find attached your Action Plan which specifies what you should do to secure your financial life and build wealth for your goals.
You may have some paperwork to do, submit some documents, do some medical tests, make payments etc. If you need help with implementing the action points given here, please entertain our colleague from the Member Engagement Team who will call you to check and do whatever is necessary.
At any time, if you have any clarifications or any assistance please get in touch with me or our member service team @ 022-42224333
Thanks and regards {!Account.OwnerFullName}
